page.title: 11THE WORK OF THE CHURCH
page.content: All kinds of people help in the church ;members of Condover church choir,the only choir now existing out of the four parishes,the organist, cleaners , church wardens and PCC members.These people try to help in a variety of ways and often pratise the skills they are already expert in. A stewardship campaign is in operation to increase the membership of the church.Money collected in the church is used for the immediate expenses of running the church.Money is also given away to help poorer countries.The diocese of Hereford is paid a quota from church funds and this in turn finds it's way back to the parish in the form of stipend -pay- for it's vicar and building maintenence for the local church Aided Primary School.
